## Overview

The `bigwig_file` format specifies the expected directory organization for bigWig files.

## Metadata

The top-level object in the `OBJECT` file should contain a `bigwig_file` property.
This is a JSON object with the following properties:

- `version`, a string specifying the version of the `bigwig_file` format.
```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
cat("  This should be set to \"", as.character(.version), "\".", sep="")
```

## Files

The directory should contain `file.bb`, the bigWig file.
